name: len_cons

text.english: Inductive case of len: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; len(a :: l) = len(l) + 1 \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo len: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; len(a :: l) = len(l) + 1 \]

coq:
Lemma len_cons: forall a : A , forall l : list , len (a :: l) = len l + 1.
Proof.
Admitted.
